EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Here is your white paper to download: A New DDoS Protection Architecture For Volumetric Attacks <[[{{my.whitepaperURL}}]]> <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201320]]>Download paper <[[{{my.whitepaperURL}}]]> You may also be interested in our white papers Insight-Driven Automated Networking <[[https://pages.nokia.com/12018.Insight-driven-automated-networking.html]]>and Powering Intelligent Network Services with Real-Time Visibility, Analytics and Automation <[[https://pages.nokia.com/18362.intelligent-network-services-wp.html]]>.
